graph.packing

Class GRASPPackerIntSetNbrhoodFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.packing.GRASPPackerIntSetNbrhoodFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntSetNeighborhoodFilterIntf, NeighborhoodFilterIntf

     class GRASPPackerIntSetNbrhoodFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IntSetNeighborhoodFilterIntf
    implements a filter applicable to local search in GRASP approaches for the 2-packing problem, as implemented in the popt4jlib.LocalSearch.DLS class.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
